text: I'm so excited about this wonderful day!
This is the best news I've ever received
My heart is full of joy
Nothing seems to work out for me
Everything makes me want to cry
I'm so angry I can't think straight
This injustice makes me so mad
I can't believe this is happening
This is so frustrating and annoying
I'm about to lose my temper
The pressure is too much to handle
I'm stressed out of my mind
I can't cope with all this pressure
I'm just doing my usual routine
I feel neither happy nor sad
